name: Ghostbudsters
description:
Description:

You're a spirit hunter with two souls, one is your own, the other belongs to a long lost friend. He always helps you out with any otherworldly obstacles you might face in your path, however, one day he asks a favor of you, to visit a very old forgotten mansion, you have no idea what's in there, but whatever it is you figure you'll find out, for better, or for worse...

Controls:

WASD or Arrows to Move

Z or M to Interact

Spacebar to Switch forms

Made by Koba, Sr.Checa, WillAIChan in 2 days for United Game Jam.

External Assets:

Music - Midnight in the Graveyard:  http://www.twinmusicom.org/news/halloween-pack-2015/
